title: hanumana matave
sahitya:
hanumana matave hariya matavO hariya matave hanumana matavO


anupallavi

  hanumanu olidare hari tAnolivanu hanumanu munidare hari muniva


caraNam 1    hanumana nambida sugrIva gedda hanumanu nambada vAliyu bidda
    caraNam 2    hanumanu olida vibhISaNa gedda hanumanu munidake rAvaNa bidda
    caraNam 3    hanumanu purandara viTTalana dAsa purandara viTTanau hanumanoL vAsa
